roleset.name: manner of speaking

example.name: Arg 1 as an 'objectionable thing'
example.text: A massive protest against the Bush administration

example.name: Arg 1 as an utterance
example.text: their protests that present plans contain no coercion
example.arg: that present plans contain no coercion

roleset.note: Roleset based on protest.02. No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Arg 0 and 1 again
example.text: The Bush administration's protests that the press revelations about the financial monitoring program may tip off terrorists.
example.arg: that the press revelations about the financial monitoring program may tip off terrorists.
